pr_title: Removing the need for a default JS engine in JDK to call ant tryme.

timeline.message: Removing the need for a default JS engine in JDK to call ant tryme.
Reimplement the merge of the tryme.arg.* properties into tryme.args in java
Should have a known iteration order; tryme.args is always non-empty, no need to set it.

timeline.body: The JavaScript code is using `setNewProperty` - e.g. don't override existing previous definition. This code is using `setProperty`. That may alter the semantics.
timeline.bodyText: The JavaScript code is using setNewProperty - e.g. don't override existing previous definition. This code is using setProperty. That may alter the semantics.
timeline.bodyHTML: The JavaScript code is using setNewProperty - e.g. don't override existing previous definition. This code is using setProperty. That may alter the semantics.
timeline.author: JaroslavTulach

timeline.body:
```suggestion
 * Merge the arguments supplied via any {@code tryme.arg.*} properties into the
 * property {@code tryme.args}.
```
timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * Merge the arguments supplied via the tryme.arg.* properties into the
          
          
            
             * property tryme.args.
          
          
            
             * Merge the arguments supplied via any {@code tryme.arg.*} properties into the
          
          
            
             * property {@code tryme.args}.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
* Merge the arguments supplied via the tryme.arg.* properties into the
* property tryme.args.
* Merge the arguments supplied via any {@code tryme.arg.*} properties into the
* property {@code tryme.args}.
timeline.author: jglick
